_header: Master in majesty Maker of all
Title(s): Hystoria Troiana; The Gest Historiale of the Destruction of Troy
_description: The Gest Historiale of the Destruction of Troy — 14044 alliterative lines, translated from Guido de Colonna’s Historia Destructionis Troiae

GULHun388.First Lines:
Maistur in mageste maker of AlleEndles and on euer to
                    Last…

…Now the p…ss proses is plainly put to
                    anendHe bryng vs to the blisse þat bled for our Syn

Preceded by list of contents, ff. 1-1v; folios at end of
